examples.korean: How is the old girl these days? 발음듣기 요즘 부인[모친]은 어떠신가? Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: How is the old girl these days? 발음

examples.korean: I respectfully request a leave of absence to attend to my mother's funeral. 발음듣기 모친의 장례를 치르기 위해 정중히 휴가를 요청합니다. DARAKWON
examples.english: I respectfully request a leave of absence to attend to my mother's funeral. 발음

examples.korean: I learned only yesterday of your mother's death. 발음듣기 모친께서 별세하셨다는 소식을 어제서야 알게 됐습니다. DARAKWON
examples.english: I learned only yesterday of your mother's death. 발음

examples.korean: He naturally lamented his mother's death. 발음듣기 그는 당연히 모친의 죽음을 애통해했다. Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He naturally lamented his mother's death. 발음

examples.korean: He wore a black armband when his mother died. 발음듣기 모친이 돌아가셨을 때, 그는 검은 상장을 달았다. Neungyule
examples.english: He wore a black armband when his mother died. 발음
